verbs.description: I could only laugh upon reading the letter that accused those who oppose Donald Trump of being haters , which the writer said will be the undoing of our " liberal " opposition . What he is seeing rather is horror that a man of such low moral character and limited intelligence could have been elected President , coupled with the double horror that his victory may not have been achieved legitimately . It seems that an innocent " no collusion -- it 's a hoax " man should not protest so much . Yes , we carry righteous anger that our system might have been abused . That is a good thing . The special counsel in due time will uncover the truth , which has been dribbling our bit by bit but goes unrecognized by people who refuse to watch and read legitimate media . Jackie Evangelista , Painesville

The special counsel in due time will uncover the truth , which has been dribbling our bit by bit but goes unrecognized by people who refuse to watch and read legitimate media .
